You have ascended to the 15th Step and stand among the greatest of Razmir's priests. You can Craft your Razmiri mask out of gold or upgrade your existing mask to a gold one in the same time it takes to Craft one made of iron. A gold Razmiri mask grants a +3 item bonus to Deception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Lie] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Feint], is a 14th-level item, and gains the following activation in addition to those possessed by the standard and silver masks.

Activateâ€”Call Upon Razmir's Wrath 2 (concentrate, manipulate, occult)

Frequency once per day

Effect You cry out to Razmir to reveal his fiery wrath, as he did upon the unbelievers at Melcat. You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Sunburst] as an 8th-rank occult spell, but for undead targets the spell has the incapacitation trait.
